          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "language": [
              [
                "Go"
              ]
            ],
            "title": [
              [
                "var fm FileManager\ndef := declarative.MainWindow{\n\tAssignTo: \u0026fm.window,\n\tTitle:    \"File Manageer\",\n\tMinSize:  declarative.Size{Width: 240, Height: 200},\n\tSize:     declarative.Size{Width: 320, Height: 400},\n\tLayout:   declarative.VBox{},\n\tChildren: []declarative.Widget{\n\t\tdeclarative.LineEdit{\n\t\t\tAssignTo:      \u0026fm.fileFilterEdit,\n\t\t\tVisible:       true,\n\t\t\tCueBanner:     \"Enter file filter\",\n\t\t\tOnTextChanged: fm.onFilterChanged,\n\t\t\tOnKeyUp: func(key walk.Key) {\n\t\t\t\tif key == walk.KeyEscape {\n\t\t\t\t\tfm.fileFilterEdit.SetText(\"\")\n\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t},\n\t\t},\n\t\tdeclarative.Label{\n\t\t\tAssignTo: \u0026fm.dirLabel,\n\t\t\tVisible:  true,\n\t\t\tText:     \"Directory:\",\n\t\t},\n\t\tdeclarative.ListBox{\n\t\t\tAssignTo:        \u0026fm.filesListBox,\n\t\t\tVisible:         true,\n\t\t\tOnItemActivated: fm.onFileClicked,\n\t\t},\n\t},\n}"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "type": "code",
          "version": 24
        }

              "(b) Consider changing to \"to create the "
            ],
            [
              "rsrc.syso",
              [
                [
                  "c"
                ]
              ]
            ],
            [
              " file that the go linker will embed as a resource\". I suggest this change because the convention to use 'go' in lower case confuses the grammar."
